message.content:
cs.DC, cs.CR, cs.DB, cs.NI, cs.Distributed Systems. 

The paper proposes a new distributed commit protocol for conducting transactions across an arbitrary number of blockchains without any centralized component. This involves distributed systems, databases, and networking, which are covered by the sub-categories cs.DC, cs.DB, and cs.NI. The paper also discusses security and cryptography, which are covered by the sub-category cs.CR. Finally, the paper focuses on cross-blockchain transactions, which falls under the sub-category cs.Distributed Systems.
